title: The Pipette
creator_credit: Australian Teaching Films, Craig Baynes and L.M. Simmons
brief_description: One of a series of instructional films demonstrating the use of chemical apparatus; correct method of using the pipette; cleaning and preparation; filling; adjustment of liquid level to measuring mark; discharging the pipette; washing and cleaning after use.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Teaching Films, Craig Baynes and L.M. Simmons
